task: Coordinate a multi-day educational retreat for a group of scholars at an eco-friendly resort in Bali. Arrange for eco-friendly transportation options, mapping of daily educational sessions on local culture and environmental conservation. Plan excursions including a guided rainforest tour, a visit to a turtle conservation center, and a local crafts workshop. Handle special accommodations for accessibility needs, create custom learning materials, and provide sustainable dining options.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

agents.name: retreat_coordination_agent
agents.role: Oversees the coordination of the entire retreat, focusing on venue and schedule.

agents.name: resort_booking_agent
agents.role: Responsible for investigating and securing booking at suitable eco-friendly resorts.

agents.name: sustainability_resort_specialist
agents.role: Specializes in finding and validating eco-friendly accommodations.

agents.name: transportation_agent
agents.role: Manages all transport-related logistics with a focus on eco-friendly solutions.

agents.name: eco_transport_service
agents.role: Arranges eco-friendly transportation options locally.

agents.name: educational_content_agent
agents.role: Develops educational content and plans sessions for the retreat.

agents.name: session_plan_generator
agents.role: Creates daily educational session plans on local culture and conservation.

agents.name: cultural_expert_agent
agents.role: Provides expertise in local Balinese culture and ecosystems, incorporating this knowledge into sessions.

agents.name: excursion_planning_agent
agents.role: Organizes and schedules excursions and local tours.

agents.name: excursion_schedule_coordinator
agents.role: Coordinates detailed schedules for each planned excursion.

agents.name: guide_booking_service
agents.role: Books knowledgeable local tour guides for all excursions.

agents.name: accessibility_services_agent
agents.role: Ensures all facilities and events are accessible to those with special needs.

agents.name: accommodation_accessibility_exit
agents.role: Works specifically on making accommodations accessible.

agents.name: culinary_experience_agent
agents.role: Curates dining experiences focusing on sustainability.

agents.name: sustainable_dining_planner
agents.role: Plans and ensures all meals meet sustainable and dietary needs.

agents.name: logistics_and_budget_agent
agents.role: Monitors budget and manages logistics to ensure efficient operation.

agents.name: budget_monitor_agent
agents.role: Keeps track of all expenses and aligns them with the retreat budget.

agents.name: eco_resort_contact_agent
agents.role: Directly contacts eco-resorts to confirm availability and negotiate terms.

agents.name: local_transfer_booking
agents.role: Coordinates local eco-friendly transport bookings.

agents.name: electric_vehicle_rental_service
agents.role: Manages the rental and logistics of electric vehicles for the retreat.

agents.name: learning_material_designer
agents.role: Designs and customizes learning materials for retreat sessions.

agents.name: local_tour_guide_agent
agents.role: A local guide responsible for conducting tours and excursions.

agents.name: special_needs_consultant
agents.role: Advises on and implements accessibility arrangements for attendees with special needs.

agents.name: supply_chain_inspector
agents.role: Ensures that all dining supplies adhere to sustainability standards.

agents.name: expense_tracking_service
agents.role: Tracks all incurred expenses throughout the retreat.

agents.name: payment_verification_unit
agents.role: Verifies and processes payments for various services during the retreat.

agents.name: content_personalization_agent
agents.role: Tailors educational content to specific participant needs.

agents.name: interactive_presentation_designer
agents.role: Creates interactive presentations to enhance learning experiences.

tools.name: custom_sustainability_checklist_tool
tools.description: Generates checklists for sustainable practices specific to the event.

event_scope.description: The scope or category of the event, such as 'Dining' or 'Transport'

tools.name: eco_activity_builder_tool
tools.description: Develops eco-friendly activities considering local culture and resources.

participant_count.description: The number of participants for the activity
